
```{r}
#| label: totals

coop_ds$mes %>% 
  select(racimos:total_eur) %>% 
  rename(
    Racimos  = racimos,
    Peso     = total_kg,
    Ingresos = total_eur
  ) %>% 
  gt_plt_summary(title = NULL) %>% 
  tab_header(
    title = "Valores principales",
    subtitle = "Desde 2021"
  ) %>% 
  cols_hide(columns = c(n_missing)) %>%
  fmt_integer(columns = c(Mean:SD), sep_mark = ".") %>% 
  cols_label(
    name = "COLUMN", value = NULL,
    name = "Column", value="Histograma",
    Mean = "Media",
    Median = "Mediana",
    SD = "Desv."
  )



  

```
